org.opends.server.extensions

Class SASLByteChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.extensions.SASLByteChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionSecurityProvider

    public final class SASLByteChannel
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionSecurityProvider
    This class implements a SASL byte channel that can be used during confidentiality and integrity.

    • Method Detail

      • getSASLByteChannel

        public static SASLByteChannel getSASLByteChannel(ClientConnection c,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 SASLContext context)
        Return a SASL byte channel instance created using the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        c - A client connection associated with the instance.
        name - The name of the instance (SASL mechanism name).
        context - A SASL context associated with the instance.
        Returns:
        A SASL byte channel.
